title: Personal Consultation
description: One-on-one sessions with our relocation experts to plan your move to Portugal.
details: Get tailored advice and answers to all your relocation questions. Our experts help you understand the process, requirements, and best next steps for your unique situation.

title: Visa & Residency Guidance
description: Step-by-step support for all Portugal visa and residency types.
details: We guide you through the paperwork, eligibility, and application process for the right visa or residency permit.

title: Document & Appointment Handling
description: We manage your document preparation and schedule all necessary appointments.
details: From gathering required documents to booking appointments with authorities, we handle the admin so you can focus on your move.

title: Legal & Administrative Support
description: Expert help with legal and administrative hurdles in Portugal.
details: Our team and partners help you navigate legal requirements, contracts, and official processes with confidence.

title: Online Progress Tracking
description: Track your relocation progress and next steps online, anytime.
details: Our digital platform keeps you updated on your case status, documents, and upcoming tasks.

title: Community Forum
description: Connect with other expats and get real-world advice.
details: Join our online community to ask questions, share experiences, and get support from fellow movers.
